oai_dc:dc.dc:title: General Edward Pakenham
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: British General Edward Pakenham charging on dark horse. He is in military uniform with one arm raised holding a hat. Foot soldiers in background with guns. British flag in background on the right. "Packenham's Charge"
Pakenham died while trying to inspire his troops charging the American lines at New Orleans on January 8, 1815.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pakenham, Edward Michael, 1778-1815
